<url>http://www.lsoft.com/images/listserv_small.gif</url> </image>   <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACADEMIC-INDUSTRY-RELATIONS;81da81b3.1412">   <title>ESRC Seminar "Regulation and the individual experience of work" </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACADEMIC-INDUSTRY-RELATIONS;81da81b3.1412</link>   <description> Colleagues,<br><br>We would like to invite you to register to attend the ESRC Seminar &quot;Regulation and the Individual Experience of Work&quot;, which will take place on the 12th and 13th of February 2015 at Newcastle University Business School. This is the fourth seminar of the ESRC Seminar Series on the Regulation of Work and Employment. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-12-08T14:11:48+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Jenny Rodriguez</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACADEMIC-INDUSTRY-RELATIONS;81da81b3.1412</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACADEMIC-INDUSTRY-RELATIONS;d0d59ee8.1411">   <title>Connecting Universities to Business - Ft Lord Heseltine, Lord Adonis & Rt Hon Liam Byrne - online viewing available </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACADEMIC-INDUSTRY-RELATIONS;d0d59ee8.1411</link>   <description> Speakers confirmed<br>The Rt Hon. The Lord Heseltine CH<br><br>Lord Adonis, Shadow Infrastructure Minister<br><br>Rt Hon Liam Byrne MP, Shadow Minister for Universities, Science and Skills<br><br>Aaron Porter, Director - External Relations, National Centre for Universities and Business<br><br>John Widdowson, Principal, New Durham College; Chair, Mixed Economy Group<br><br>Professor Angus Laing, Dean, Loughborough University Business School; Chair, Association of Business Schools [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-11-09T19:35:29+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Adam Eardley</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACADEMIC-INDUSTRY-RELATIONS;d0d59ee8.1411</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACADEMIC-INDUSTRY-RELATIONS;8ed8896f.1410">   <title>Call for Contributions - ESRC Seminar: Regulation and the Individual Experience of Work </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACADEMIC-INDUSTRY-RELATIONS;8ed8896f.1410</link>   <description> Colleagues,<br><br>Please find below the call for papers for the fourth event in the ESRC Seminar Series on the Regulation of Work and Employment.<br><br>With best wishes and apologies for cross-posting,<br><br>Jenny<br><br>[Description: ewcastle University, University of Strathclyde and University of Monash logos]<br><br>ESRC Seminar Series<br><br>The Regulation of Work and Employment:<br><br>Towards a Multi-Disciplinary, Multilevel Framework [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-10-13T17:27:18+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Jenny Rodriguez</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACADEMIC-INDUSTRY-RELATIONS;8ed8896f.1410</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACADEMIC-INDUSTRY-RELATIONS;a95314cb.1410">   <title>Two weeks left, Industry 4.0 talks ! - register now avoid disappointment - October 21st 2014 in Ghent, Belgium </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACADEMIC-INDUSTRY-RELATIONS;a95314cb.1410</link>   <description> Are you involved in (automation) industry and services, in e-health, in education, in R&amp;D, \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd or you are interested in general aspects of transforming our economy to be competitive for the future? Take a look at the overview of our conference program in this mail, and more detailed and up-to-date on www.imosyde.eu, where you can also register!<br>There are five well organized parallel sessions throughout the day, you can choose according to your personal interest<br>\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd Human Machine Interface &amp; Remote Control / Learning [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-10-06T14:28:31+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Li Cheng</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACADEMIC-INDUSTRY-RELATIONS;a95314cb.1410</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACADEMIC-INDUSTRY-RELATIONS;8227c166.1410">   <title>Growing Local Business Management Knowledge Programme </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACADEMIC-INDUSTRY-RELATIONS;8227c166.1410</link>   <description> Broadcast Business Programme<br><br>A key feature of industrial or commercial growth periods is the interconnectedness of business communities with civic infrastructure and planning powers, finance sources and the research, management knowledge and creative innovators. The Institutes of the industrial revolution were centres of learning where entrepreneurs met, civic leaders backed projects where industrial and business managers learned new techniques. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-10-06T09:26:53+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Adam Eardley</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACADEMIC-INDUSTRY-RELATIONS;8227c166.1410</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACADEMIC-INDUSTRY-RELATIONS;7218bbfd.1409">   <title>Industry 4.0 talks ! - October 21st 2014 in Ghent, Belgium </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACADEMIC-INDUSTRY-RELATIONS;7218bbfd.1409</link>   <description> Are you involved in (automation) industry and services, in e-health, in education, in R&amp;D, \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd or you are interested in general aspects of transforming our economy to be competitive for the future? Take a look at the overview of our conference program in this mail, and more detailed and up-to-date on www.imosyde.eu, were you can also subscribe! [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-09-21T21:13:41+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Li Cheng</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACADEMIC-INDUSTRY-RELATIONS;7218bbfd.1409</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACADEMIC-INDUSTRY-RELATIONS;ea160ba1.1409">   <title>Sage Publications Call for Authors Extended Deadline Mass Media & Society </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACADEMIC-INDUSTRY-RELATIONS;ea160ba1.1409</link>   <description> We are inviting academic editorial contributors to The SAGE International Encyclopedia of Mass Media & Society, a new multivolume reference to be published in 2016. While the world of mass media is constantly changing, as new types of media such as blogging and online newspapers augment or displace older types such as print newspapers and broadcast television, the mass media remains a key force in modern society. The rapid rise of social media sites such as Facebook and LinkedIn, and the participatory nature of many types of new media, also mean that people who once might have expected only to [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-09-06T21:23:38+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Melodie Hagspiel</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACADEMIC-INDUSTRY-RELATIONS;ea160ba1.1409</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACADEMIC-INDUSTRY-RELATIONS;c6f71fe2.1408">   <title>Invitation: ESRC Seminar & Workshop. Regulation of Work & Employment: Monash Universityn Prato Centre, Tuscany, 15-16 Sep. 2014. Please circulate. Thanks! </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACADEMIC-INDUSTRY-RELATIONS;c6f71fe2.1408</link>   <description> Colleagues,<br><br>The third seminar and international workshop on regulation of work and employment is all set to go but there's still time to register to attend.<br><br>We have a great line-up of scholars discussing international regulation from different perspectives. It promises to be very stimulating! Details below.<br><br>Best,<br>Jenny    </description>   <dc:date>2014-08-26T20:42:58+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Jenny Rodriguez</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACADEMIC-INDUSTRY-RELATIONS;c6f71fe2.1408</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACADEMIC-INDUSTRY-RELATIONS;a1a3a6be.1407">   <title>Business engagement skills in the university context and Open Innovation courses @ Imperial College London </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACADEMIC-INDUSTRY-RELATIONS;a1a3a6be.1407</link>   <description> Dear All,<br>Please could you kindly circulate details of the following short courses which may be of interest.<br>Thank you    </description>   <dc:date>2014-07-31T14:43:30+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Moreno, Eva M</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACADEMIC-INDUSTRY-RELATIONS;a1a3a6be.1407</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACADEMIC-INDUSTRY-RELATIONS;2b3b9727.1406">   <title>ESRC Seminar and International Research Workshop - Monash Universty Prato Centre, Tuscany, Italy, 15 & 16 September 2014, 9AM - 5PM </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACADEMIC-INDUSTRY-RELATIONS;2b3b9727.1406</link>   <description> Colleagues,<br><br>The event below might be of interest.<br><br>Best (and apologies for cross-posting),<br><br>Jenny<br><br>[Description: ewcastle University, University of Strathclyde and University of Monash logos]<br><br>ESRC Seminar Series<br><br>The Regulation of Work and Employment:<br><br>Towards a Multi-Disciplinary, Multilevel Framework<br><br>ESRC Seminar and International Research Workshop<br><br>Monash University Prato Centre, Tuscany, Italy<br><br>15 &amp; 16 September 2014, 9AM - 5PM<br><br>Invitation to Seminar and Call for Papers for Research Workshop [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-06-30T13:32:56+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Jenny Rodriguez</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACADEMIC-INDUSTRY-RELATIONS;2b3b9727.1406</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACADEMIC-INDUSTRY-RELATIONS;ce36e9d5.1405">   <title>Business engagement skills in the university context and Open Innovation courses @ Imperial College London </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACADEMIC-INDUSTRY-RELATIONS;ce36e9d5.1405</link>   <description> Dear All,<br>Please could you kindly circulate details of the following short courses which may be of interest.<br>Thank you    </description>   <dc:date>2014-05-23T13:48:29+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Moreno, Eva M</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACADEMIC-INDUSTRY-RELATIONS;ce36e9d5.1405</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACADEMIC-INDUSTRY-RELATIONS;5b1334a2.1405">   <title>National Manufacturing Debate 2014 </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACADEMIC-INDUSTRY-RELATIONS;5b1334a2.1405</link>   <description>Full message available at: <a href="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACADEMIC-INDUSTRY-RELATIONS;5b1334a2.1405">National Manufacturing Debate 2014 </a></description>   <dc:date>2014-05-07T23:52:31+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Roy, Rajkumar</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ACADEMIC-INDUSTRY-RELATIONS;5b1334a2.1405</dc:identifier> </item>   </rdf:RDF>
